MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls"}}},"title":"EIP1271 Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/interfaces/GPv2EIP1271.sol":"EIP1271Verifier"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1},"remappings":[":@hyperlane-xyz/=node_modules/@hyperlane-xyz/",":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":canonical-weth/=node_modules/canonical-weth/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat-deploy/=node_modules/hardhat-deploy/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"]},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/GPv2EIP1271.sol":{"keccak256":"0x980bddd301af4e9ee0fff5bd84a0bd12d7a359be4f5abda0f1c99e607e445b1c","license":"LGPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://d50e341790048037515c9f471a48bad1598c04bc846eaf84b40bb5cabcfbe2d4","dweb:/ipfs/QmfJR7MVkgN5yEzsTSHe3RVtRfanoTkdS8m1ensCnMX7oM"]}},"version":1}

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data

params._hash: Hash of the data to be signed
params._signature: Signature byte array associated with _data MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x1626ba7e when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls
